short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flip a coin. Have your answer translated into a random language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is dedicated to my bonus sister Jadzia (the inspiration for this app). Whenever she can't decide something she'll flip a coin, so I made this handy coin flip app for her browser. I also added the random language translation of the answer of "yes" or "no" as an added bonus
